title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Measuring Metacognitive Awareness in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, aiming to improve metacognitive application skills in real medical education scenarios for current practitioners, utilizing smartphone-based simple assessment tools in PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners will accurately self-assess their knowledge levels using post-decision wagering and Likert-scale instruments.
Learners will analyze gaps between actual knowledge and metacognitive awareness, then develop improvement plans.
Learners will apply error identification and correction strategies with 85% or higher accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
